attributes.action: Repeal Section 1 Dangerous Dogs Act 1991 and Stop Breed Specific Legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned request that section 1 of Dangerous Dogs Act 1991 be repealed. Dogs are being unnecessarily seized and destroyed because of Breed Specific Legislation. This is unfair, we should make clearer provisions to ensure all dog owners are more responsible, this is the way forward. Breed Specific Legislation = Dog Racism and unfairness, and is not acceptable.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to repeal Section 1 Dangerous Dogs Act 1991 and Stop Breed Specific Legislation.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=DDARepeal1991


Her Majesty's Government
